collection_holder_name: UMass Amherst Libraries, Special Collections & University Archives
pageContext.collection_title: The American Revolution Documentary Collection, ca.1968-1974
pageContext.collection_description: The American Revolution collection includes hundreds of hours of recordings from WBCN during the period 1968-1974, along with posters, ephemera, videos, oral histories, and other associated materials. The audio and video content has been digitized by our partners, Lichtenstein Creative Media, and will be made available to the public through our digital repository. Materials are currently in the process of being transferred to UMass.
pageContext.collection_notes: UMass will care for digital copies plus, whenever available, the original analog materials, consisting mostly of half-inch reel-to-reel tapes plus some cassettes.
